Articles.Content: how do i get back from duna to kerbin with unlimited fuel and mechjeb?

The same way you got to Duna from Kerbin

With mechjeb, you get into solar orbit (you want to get into a retrograde orbit relative to Duna), then fire up the MechJeb Orbital Operations>Trans tool.

The same way you got to Duna from Kerbin

With mechjeb, you get into solar orbit (you want to get into a retrograde orbit relative to Duna), then fire up the MechJeb Orbital Operations>Trans tool.

1. You don't get into a retrograde orbit around Kerbol. You burn retrograde, but only enough so that your orbit intersects with Kerbin's.

2. To get to Moho and Eve, you lower your periapsis to their orbit, and then align planes.
